availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Andrew J. Frost ( Allen County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Allen County, Kentucky, farmer. Allen County, Kentucky, native. Married to Francis Wadkins Frost in Allen County on February 9, 1843. Father of Nancy S. Frost, Caroline Frost, Joseph W. Frost, Martha J. Frost, and James Warren Frost. Farmer in Allen County in 1850. Farmer in Allen County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States(1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Allen county, p. 111A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Allen County, Puncheon District, p. 300.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Allen County, Precinct 1, p. 169B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Allen County Marriages, Film #000851644, p. 31.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File #11249.
